definitions.definition: The outermost layer of the skin of vertebrates ; the epidermis .
The strip of hardened skin at the base and sides of a fingernail or toenail .
A noncellular protective covering outside the epidermis of many invertebrates and plants .
A thin skin formed on the surface of a liquid .

main_definition: The outermost layer of the skin of vertebrates ; the epidermis .
secondary_definitions: The strip of hardened skin at the base and sides of a fingernail or toenail .
( zoology , botany ) A noncellular protective covering outside the epidermis of many invertebrates and plants .
A thin skin formed on the surface of a liquid .
